page.title: 05ARE YOU A WITCH ?
page.content: Since the earliest times people have told stories about witches and the evil spirits lurking around the countryside.So much so that they believe they are actually seeing them.The tales are so persistent and the descriptions so vivid about them,that they are frequently beleived to be true.In the past people believed in witches and would punish them horrifyingly with a number of very painful punishments,such as burning at the stake or being crushed under a board with stones piled on top of it.Rumour has it that in Berrywood copse there used to live a mother with her 3, daughters.The owner of the land thought that 2 of the daughters were witches so one night he crept out of bed and burnt the house down, killing the whole family.Ever since then there have been two sprits.
